trans-unit.resname: UGIN·1 | Ugin, the Spirit Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon
trans-unit.target: 灵龙乌金

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·1 | Ugin, the Spirit Dragon | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +2: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to target creature or player. −X: Exile each permanent with converted mana cost X or less that's one or more colors. −10: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: +2：灵龙乌金对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。−X：放逐所有总法术力费用等于或小于X的有色永久物。−10：你获得7点生命，抓七张牌，然后将至多七张永久物牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·19 | Mastery of the Unseen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mastery of the Unseen
trans-unit.target: 消形奇技

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·19 | Mastery of the Unseen | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, you gain 1 life for each creature you control. {3}{W}: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的永久物翻回正面时，你每操控一个生物，便获得1点生命。{3}{W}：显化你的牌库顶牌。（将它面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·24 | Smite the Monstrous | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Smite the Monstrous
trans-unit.target: 击灭恶物

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·24 | Smite the Monstrous | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标力量等于或大于4的生物。

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·24 | Smite the Monstrous | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The changing of a single moment in Tarkir's past altered its future, rewriting its history.
trans-unit.target: 鞑契过往这一瞬的变化已经改变未来，重写历史。

trans-unit.source: Soul Summons
trans-unit.target: 唤魂术

trans-unit.source: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 显化你的牌库顶牌。（将它面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: Ugin's magic reaches beyond the dragons. The clans have adapted it for war.
trans-unit.target: 乌金的魔法已不再为龙专属，各部落已将其活用于战事之中。

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·30 | Watcher of the Roost | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Watcher of the Roost
trans-unit.target: 眺巢看守

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·30 | Watcher of the Roost | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Morph— Reveal a white card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Watcher of the Roost is turned face up, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行变身～从你手上展示一张白色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）当眺巢看守翻回正面时，你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Jeskai Infiltrator
trans-unit.target: 洁斯凯渗透者

trans-unit.source: Jeskai Infiltrator can't be blocked as long as you control no other creatures. When Jeskai Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, exile it and the top card of your library in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 只要你未操控其他生物，洁斯凯渗透者便不能被阻挡。当洁斯凯渗透者对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐它和你的牌库顶牌并牌面朝下地放作一堆，将此牌堆洗牌，然后显化这些牌。（显化某张牌的流程是，将该牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: Reality Shift
trans-unit.target: 实界变化

trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of his or her library. (That player puts the top card of his or her library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物。其操控者显化其牌库顶牌。（该牌手将其牌库顶牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。若该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用来翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·48 | Mystic of the Hidden Way | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic of the Hidden Way
trans-unit.target: 隐宗秘教徒

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·48 | Mystic of the Hidden Way | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Mystic of the Hidden Way can't be blocked. Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: 隐宗秘教徒不能被阻挡。变身{2}{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·48 | Mystic of the Hidden Way | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There are many different paths. The Great Teacher reveals them all."
trans-unit.target: 「世间道路众多，唯有大宗师能揭示一切。」

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·59 | Write into Being | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Write into Being
trans-unit.target: 墨写成真

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·59 | Write into Being | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Look at the top two cards of your library. Manifest one of those cards, then put the other on the top or bottom of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的两张牌。显化其中一张牌，然后将另一张置于你的牌库顶或牌库底。（显化某张牌的流程是，将该牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: Debilitating Injury
trans-unit.target: 虚弱创伤

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物所结附的生物得-2/-2。

trans-unit.source: Weakness exists within all who are not dragons.
trans-unit.target: 若非巨龙，必有弱点。

trans-unit.source: Grim Haruspex
trans-unit.target: 阴森肠占师

trans-unit.source: Morph {B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 变身{B}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Your enemies may be cowardly, my lord, but one should never call them gutless."
trans-unit.target: 「主上，您的敌人或许胆小，但绝不能说他们无胆。」

trans-unit.source: Sultai Emissary
trans-unit.target: 苏勒台密使

trans-unit.source: When Sultai Emissary dies, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 当苏勒台密使死去时，显化你的牌库顶牌。（将该牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: To the Sultai, Ugin's power was just one more resource to be exploited.
trans-unit.target: 在苏勒台眼中，乌金的力量不过是另一种尚待利用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Ruthless Ripper
trans-unit.target: 无情夺魂客

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch Morph— Reveal a black card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Ruthless Ripper is turned face up, target player loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 死触变身～从你手上展示一张黑色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）当无情夺魂客翻回正面时，目标牌手失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Ainok Tracker
trans-unit.target: 侦猎犬人

trans-unit.source: First strike Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻变身{4}{R}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: "The ainok are wild dogs, not fit to join us around the fire."\n—Surrak, the Hunt Caller
trans-unit.target: 「犬人就是野狗，不配跟我们一起围坐火旁。」 ～召猎人苏拉克

trans-unit.source: Arc Lightning
trans-unit.target: 弧状闪电

trans-unit.source: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.
trans-unit.target: 弧状闪电对一个，两个，或三个目标生物和／或牌手造成共3点伤害，你可以任意分配。

trans-unit.source: Lightning burns the dragon's path.
trans-unit.target: 闪电烧出巨龙的通路。

trans-unit.source: Fierce Invocation
trans-unit.target: 狂热祝愿

trans-unit.source: Manifest the top card of your library, then put two +1/+1 counters on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 显化你的牌库顶牌，然后在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物。（显化某张牌的流程是，将该牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: Anger can empower those who embrace it.
trans-unit.target: 放纵怒火的人能感受其力量。

trans-unit.source: Jeering Instigator
trans-unit.target: 嘲讽煽动者

trans-unit.source: Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Jeering Instigator is turned face up, if it's your turn, gain control of another target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 变身{2}{R}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）当嘲讽煽动者翻回正面时，若是在你的回合中，则获得另一个目标生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·123 | Arashin War Beast | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arashin War Beast
trans-unit.target: 阿拉辛战争兽

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·123 | Arashin War Beast | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Arashin War Beast deals combat damage to one or more blocking creatures, manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 每当阿拉辛战争兽对一个或数个进行阻挡的生物造成战斗伤害时，显化你的牌库顶牌。（将它面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: Formless Nurturing
trans-unit.target: 无形滋养

trans-unit.source: Manifest the top card of your library, then put a +1/+1 counter on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 显化你的牌库顶牌，然后在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。（显化某张牌的流程是，将该牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: Dragonscale Boon
trans-unit.target: 龙鳞恩泽

trans-unit.source: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature and untap it.
trans-unit.target: 在目标生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物并重置它。

trans-unit.source: Only those who have proved themselves worthy are granted a dragon's scale.
trans-unit.target: 唯有证明自身价值者才配得赐龙鳞。

trans-unit.source: Wildcall
trans-unit.target: 荒野呼唤

trans-unit.source: Manifest the top card of your library, then put X +1/+1 counters on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 显化你的牌库顶牌，然后在其上放置X个+1/+1指示物。（显化某张牌的流程是，将该牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: A howl on the wind hides many dangers.
trans-unit.target: 呼啸风声掩藏了许多危险。

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·161 | Hewed Stone Retainers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hewed Stone Retainers
trans-unit.target: 石雕侍从

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·161 | Hewed Stone Retainers | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Cast Hewed Stone Retainers only if you've cast another spell this turn.
trans-unit.target: 只能于你已施放过其他咒语的回合中施放石雕侍从。

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·161 | Hewed Stone Retainers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Their origins are shrouded in mystery. I believe they are the protectors of the lost secrets of our world."\n—Jilaya, Temur whisperer
trans-unit.target: 「它们的起源是未解之谜，我相信它们是我们世界失落之秘密的保护者。」 ～铁木尔低语者吉蕾娅

trans-unit.source: Ugin's Construct
trans-unit.target: 乌金组构体

trans-unit.source: When Ugin's Construct enters the battlefield, sacrifice a permanent that's one or more colors.
trans-unit.target: 当乌金组构体进战场时，牺牲一个有色的永久物。

trans-unit.source: While trapping the Eldrazi on Zendikar, Ugin learned little from Sorin, but he gleaned the rudiments of lithomancy from Nahiri.
trans-unit.target: 当初三人在赞迪卡携手禁锢奥札奇时，乌金并没能从索霖处学到什么，倒是从娜希丽那掌握了基础砾岩术

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·216 | Altar of the Brood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Altar of the Brood
trans-unit.target: 族群祭坛

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·216 | Altar of the Brood | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever another permanent enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个永久物在你的操控下进战场时，每位对手各将其牌库顶牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: UGIN·216 | Altar of the Brood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Supplicants offer flesh and silver, flowers and blood. The altar takes what it will, eyes gleaming with unspoken promises.
trans-unit.target: 祈求者献上鲜肉与白银、鲜花和血液。祭坛取走它想要的，眼睛闪烁着不成文的诺言。

trans-unit.source: Briber's Purse
trans-unit.target: 行贿者钱包

trans-unit.source: Briber's Purse enters the battlefield with X gem counters on it. {1}, {T}, Remove a gem counter from Briber's Purse: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 行贿者钱包进战场时上面有X个宝石指示物。{1}，{T}，从行贿者钱包上移去一个宝石指示物：目标生物本回合不能进行攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.source: The bigger the hand, the higher the price.
trans-unit.target: 手越大，价越高。

trans-unit.source: Ghostfire Blade
trans-unit.target: 灵火剑
佩带此武具的生物得+2/+2。佩带{3}如果灵火剑之佩带异能的目标是无色生物，则该异能减少{2}来起动。

trans-unit.source: If you fear the dragon's fire, you are unworthy to wield it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你怕龙火，那么你便没资格挥舞它。
